original_title: Tyler Perry's The Marriage Counselor - The Play
overview: Roger Jackson (Tony Grant) made sacrifices so his wife, Judith (Tamar Davis), could set up practice as a marriage counselor. Now the most disastrous relationship of Judith's career could be the one she shares with her husband! Master playwright Tyler Perry crafts an unforgettable tale of laughter, loss, and love.
tagline: Every love has a beginning...and a mend.
title: Tyler Perry's The Marriage Counselor - The Play
